com.cc.user
[Groovy] Class UserManagementService

java.lang.Object
  UserManagementService

@Transactional
class UserManagementService

UserManagementService provides database specific methods to fetch list of users with filters and pagination applied.

Authors:
Shashank Agrawal

Method Summary

Used to fetch users list for Mongo Database with total count.

Method Detail

fetchListForMongo

java.util.List fetchListForMongo(java.util.Map params, boolean paginate)
Used to fetch list of user for Mongo database with filters and pagination applied.
Parameters:
params - List of parameters contains pagination, filter parameters.
paginate - Boolean value to specify whether to use pagination parameters or not.
Returns:
Filtered list of user's with distinct email.

listForMongo

java.util.Map listForMongo(java.util.Map params)
Used to fetch users list for Mongo Database with total count.
Parameters:
params - List of filter parameters.
Returns:
Map containing users list with pagination applied and total count of matched users.

listForMysql

java.util.Map listForMysql(java.util.Map params)
Used to fetch list of user for MySql database with filters and pagination applied using HQL Query.
Parameters:
params - List of parameters contains pagination, filter parameters.
Returns:
Filtered list of user's with pagination applied.

makeQueryToCheckEachRole

void makeQueryToCheckEachRole(java.lang.StringBuilder query, java.lang.Object roleFilterList)
Appends HQL query string to query parameter on basis of role filters list provided.
Parameters:
query - HQL query string to be appended.
roleFilterList - List of role filters.
